name: Scouts of the Sequined Pearls
description: Hailing, shockingly, from within the storms that rumble over the plains of Kharth, the Scouts of the Sequined Pearls are known to dive deep for treasures and marine resources. Now equipped with detailed knowledge of all the birds across Kharth, and the ability to communicate with them, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
